snippet: Hawaii’s new law caps a remarkable year for progress on same-sex marriage.
abstract: Editorial praises Hawaii Gov Neil Abercrombie for signing bill that will allow same-sex couples to marry in state; notes that measure caps a remarkable year of progress toward ensuring basic civil rights of gay Americans.
lead_paragraph: Hawaii’s new law caps a remarkable year for progress on same-sex marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
